settings.title: Gifts that celebrate small business
settings.body: We source exclusively from small and underrepresented businesses across the country. Sharing their stories and values with you is one of our greatest joys.

settings.title: Gifts that tell a story.
settings.body: We source exclusively from small and underrepresented businesses across the country. Sharing their stories and values with you is one of our greatest joys.

settings.title: Less is more.
settings.body: We always prioritize quality over quantity. When it comes to selecting products for our gifts, beautiful design and impeccable quality are non-negotiable. We also try to keep our footprint small by working with local businesses.

settings.title: Easy and speedy shipping.
settings.body: We can bulk ship to one location or 100s of individual addresses, worldwide. We make the entire process seamless.

settings.title: A fresh take on corporate gifting.
settings.body: For larger orders, leverage our design services for a fully custom gift. From the products to the packaging, we'll create something memorable that reflects your brand, goals, and values.

settings.title: Expert gifters.
settings.body: For 10 years, we've been your go-to for gifting. That also means we've been your go-to to discover all of the best small brands in one place. Trust us to help you select a gift that aligns with your values, fits in your budget, and gets there on time.

settings.title: Design + Development
settings.body: Our experienced team of curators will ask about your objectives and budget before creating a custom gifting proposal that is tailored to your needs. From the products to the packaging, we’ll create something that reflects your brand, goals and values.

settings.title: Sourcing + Production
settings.body: Our in-house procurement and design team sources premium products from small and underrepresented brands across the country, and can put your logo on trendy, high quality items that recipients will appreciate and remember.

settings.title: Packaging + Sustainability
settings.body: We offer a wide range of planet-friendly packaging. From fast turn around stock options to custom-printed mailer boxes and keepsake bags.

settings.title: Fulfillment + Warehousing
settings.body: We're capable of a lot more than just curating! We're a full scale fulfillment and logistics partner too. From shipping, receiving and warehousing to ghost fulfillment and 3PL services, we've got you covered.

settings.title: Software + Stores
settings.body: Ship, track and manage gifts all from your couch (or office chair). No more dusty supply closets or shipping boxes under your desk.

settings.title: Tired of searching for the perfect gift? We’ll make it easy for you.
New Hire Onboarding Kits
settings.body: Say a big first hello to new employees and interns with an information pack and gift box.

settings.title: Milestone Gifts
settings.body: Whether a birthday, anniversary or retirement – it’s worth celebrating.

settings.title: Event Gifts
settings.body: No event is complete without a gift or keepsake to take home.

settings.title: Client Appreciation Gifts
settings.body: Show your appreciation with a branded and personalized gift.

settings.title: Gifting For All Occasions
settings.body: Looking for a company-wide event or a one-off gift? We have you covered.

settings.title: Values-based sourcing
settings.body: We're a woman-owned business that partners with other small businesses to curate gifts for all occasions. We prioritize brands that are woman-owned, BIPOC-owned and environmentally sustainable.

settings.title: Get in touch!
settings.body: Each foodiepages gift basket is designed with premium goods from diverse, independently-owned makers and brands across Canada.

settings.text: Foodiepages has been a trusted partner of Dynacare for several years, providing quality, trusted and reliable services for important gifts for staff, clients, and executives. Not only are they thorough and dependable – but Foodiepages also makes strategic and impactful recommendations for us to bring our gifting to the next level. The costs are affordable and they go the extra mile to ensure the recipient(s) feel important and valued. I would recommend Foodiepages to anyone looking for a quality gifting partner.

Before Foodiepages, we didn't have a formal New Hire gifting program. Now that we've moved to a hybrid workforce model, partnering with Foodiepages has allowed us to streamline the process, ensure a consistent, memorable and welcoming onboarding experience for all new employees, whether they are in the office or working remotely.

We've had the pleasure of working with the Foodiepages team on gifts for our company of 500+ on numerous occasions over the past couple of years. The Foodiepages team offers the highest level of customer service and curates gifts that perfectly fit the occasion you are celebrating. No detail is ever forgotten, and even the shipping process has always been top-notch. I would highly recommend working with Foodiepages for individual gift boxes, or large-scale corporate gifting projects.

settings.title: You may also like
settings.body: Discover more products that may be of interest to you.
settings.promo_body: Do you have a complex order in mind, or just want some tips on finding the right gift? Tell us about your gifting needs and a member of our team will get in touch soon.
